Summary

As described in [2] relation between interpretability and accuracy of the model. For some models improvements can be made towards a more interpretable or more relevantÂ model.

Azure ML interpretability dashboard

There are also open-source webapps such as this one described in the medium article [4] that facilitate the exploration of the SHAP library.
